Package org.yourcompany.yourproject.Backend.businessLayer.components

Class Circuit

java.lang.Object
org.yourcompany.yourproject.Backend.businessLayer.components.Circuit
public class Circuit extends Object
Represents a digital circuit containing gates, wires, and connections. Manages circuit structure, signal propagation, and hierarchical circuit support.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Circuit(String name)
    Creates a new circuit with the specified name.

    • gatesConnectorFunc

      public Connector gatesConnectorFunc(GateComponent fromGate, int fromPort, GateComponent toGate, int toPort)
      Creates a connection (wire) between two gates.
      Parameters:
      fromGate - The source gate
      fromPort - The output port index on the source gate
      toGate - The destination gate
      toPort - The input port index on the destination gate
      Returns:
      The created connector, or null if connection failed

    • updateConnectorPos

      public void updateConnectorPos()
      Updates all wire positions (should be called when gates are moved).

    • calculateInputCount

      public int calculateInputCount()
      Calculates the total number of input ports in this circuit.
      Returns:
      The number of input ports (minimum 1)

    • calculateOutputCount

      public int calculateOutputCount()
      Calculates the total number of output ports in this circuit.
      Returns:
      The number of output ports (minimum 1)
